scripts.addNoJekyll: echo Prevent not routing folders starting with _ > export/.nojekyll
scripts.predeploy: (if exist "export" rmdir /s /q "export";) && git worktree add export gh-pages-deploy -f
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && cd export && git add --all && git commit -m "Update gh-pages" && git push origin gh-pages && cd ..
